## Plugin\_2.addRibbonIcon() method

Adds a ribbon icon to the left bar.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addRibbonIcon(icon: IconName, title: string, callback: (evt: MouseEvent) => any): HTMLElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  icon | IconName | The icon name to be used. See [addIcon()](./obsidian.addicon.md) |
|  title | string | The title to be displayed in the tooltip. |
|  callback | (evt: MouseEvent) =&gt; any | The <code>click</code> callback. |

**Returns:**

HTMLElement
